contents.name: isACollectionOf

contents.name: hasPropertiesOf
contents.description: The resource relationship network property(s) of this resource relationship network.

enumValues.name: physical
enumValues.comment: the elements of the relationship are physically connected or in the same area

enumValues.name: logical
enumValues.comment: the elements of the relationship are not necessarily physically connected or in the same area.

contents.name: relationshipForm
contents.description: Defines the form of the relationships.

enumValues.name: permanent
enumValues.comment: the relationship is not intended to be split or changed during operations processes;

enumValues.name: transient
enumValues.comment: the elements of the relationship are not necessarily physically connected or in the same area.
